com.aston.group.stationdefender.actors

Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aston.group.stationdefender.actors.Tower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor

    public class Tower
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actor
    Tower is the object which the Humans defend, and which the Aliens attack.

      • isColliding

        public boolean isColliding(int x,
                           int y,
                           int width,
                           int height)
        Check if an objects X & Y co-ordinates or width & height overlaps the Towers X & Y co-ordinates, or width & height
        Parameters:
        x - The X co-ordinate of the object to check
        y - The Y co-ordinate of the object to check
        width - The width of the object to check
        height - The height of the object to check
        Returns:
        true if the values overlap, false if the values do not overlap
